Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Northbound Reroute near Austin/Division
ShortDescription: Northbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, North and Austin: due to, street blockage near Austin/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Division, Central, North, Austin and over regular route, due to street blockage near Austin/Division.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Avenue Beach
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are unable to service North Avenue Beach. Customers may board Eastbound 72 North buses at North Avenue and Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are unable to service North Avenue Beach. Customers may board Eastbound #72 North buses at North Avenue and Clark. 

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line trains bypassing Wilson Station
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running, but are still not stopping at Wilson Station due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running, but are still not stopping at Wilson Station due to police activity

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: No trains between Howard and Belmont
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to police activity at Wilson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to police activity at Wilson.

As a result, trains are operating only between 95th/Dan Ryan and Belmont at this time.

Shuttle buses are available from Howard to Belmont to provide connecting service in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #36 Broadway and #81 Lawrence buses.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
